mean_cn: adj. 认知的；认识能力的
mean_en: of, relating to, or involving conscious mental activities (such as thinking, understanding, learning, and remembering)
word_etyma: cogn知道 + itive…的 → cognitive 认识的
sentence: This test will assess your cognitive skills and ability to think quickly.
sentence_trans: 这个测试可以评估你的认知能力和反应能力。
